div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1268 Asia Minor, southern, before 1948 Burial: 340-330 B.C. (M) Contents: 7+ AR Aspendus: double-sigloi Disposition: dispersed Information from E. G. S. Robinson This hd. may be identical with the Kara- pinar hd., no. 1245 above. However, it contained the issue Bab. Trait√© II.2, no. 1575, which was not recorded for the latter
